constraints.constraint: Data must conform to Resume interface from app/types/resume.ts
Date fields must use YYYY-MM string format (e.g., "2022-01")
Resume data must be independent from portfolio data (FR3)
File naming supports future i18n (resume.en.ts, resume.fa.ts)
Use Iconify icon names for profiles: i-mdi-linkedin, i-mdi-github
Language fluency must use union type: 'Native' | 'Fluent' | 'Intermediate' | 'Basic'
Use Ali Arghyani as sample name per Architecture doc

interface.signature: interface Resume { basics: ResumeBasics work: WorkExperience[] education: Education[] skills: Skill[] languages?: Language[] certifications?: Certification[] }

tests.standards: TypeScript compiler validates data structure at build time. No runtime tests needed for static data. Use pnpm typecheck or pnpm build to verify compilation.
